name: Gauntlet: Dungeon Breakout (Pre-Alpha)
description:
WELCOME

to GDB Pre-Alpha Demo!

Play as Rex as you enter a mysterious and grim territory, all alone, with only but a legendary artifact "the Aegis", to help you break your way out to safety before deathly devices get to you. Set within a Greek Mythology universe with dangerous stages, monsters and gods. Will you Prevail?

Gauntlet: Dungeon Breakout was inspired by the classic games Breakout and Arkanoid, bringing a fresh perspective to the genre. It will have a single player story campaign, with character customization and other exciting features.
More details on that in the future. For now, it's available for the PC and Mac.

Stay tuned on the game development updates on my:

Twitter @polysplitgames

Facebook @polysplitgames

Thanks and Enjoy!

Controls

Keyboard:

WASD or Directional Keys - Player Movement
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - Throw Shield
Left Mouse Button (Hold) - Charge Throw
Space Key - Quickstep or Dash
Right Mouse Button - Player Move to Point

Controller:
Left Stick - Player Movement
Right Stick - Aim
Right Trigger/R2 or B button/Square button - Throw Shield
Right Trigger/R2 or B button/Square button (Hold) - Charge Throw
Right Bumper/R1 or A button /Cross button- Quickstep or Dash
